      if ch[i]=="x":

n = int(input())
s = input()
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
	if s[i] == 'x' and (i == 0 or s[i - 1] != 'x'):
		j = i
		while j + 1 < n:
			if s[j + 1] == 'x':
				j += 1
			else:
				break
		sz = j - i + 1
		ans += max(0, sz - 2)
print(ans)
n = int(input())
file_name = input()

to_remove = 0
current_streak = 0

for i in range(n):
	if file_name[i] != 'x':
		current_streak = 0
		continue
	else:
		current_streak += 1
		if current_streak > 2:
			to_remove += 1


print(to_remove)

n = int(input())
s = [x for x in input()]
length = len(s)

i = 0
ans = 0
while i < len(s):
    while i + 2 < len(s) and s[i] == 'x' and s[i + 1] == 'x' and s[i + 2] == 'x':
        ans += 1
        s.pop(i)
    i += 1
